CustomField.description: A picklist for AEs to communicate to future CSM if the customer intends to install the hardware themselves or not
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A picklist for AEs to communicate to future CSM if the customer intends to install the hardware themselves or not. If you can let us know the name of the installer so we know who to contact to make sure everything is going well.
CustomField.label: Self install or Vendor
